coded_answer.p: Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. Now all the town knewknows my secret. This is a very embarrassedembarrassing situation. I have to leave this town. My god, I never should have told my sister this secret.

This story started when I arrived toin this town with my family. We comecame here to build our own house because my father had been fired and we had to sell our house in Buenos Aires. My mother suggested to comecoming here because one of her brothers was established here and he could help us.

I hadn't knownmet all of usthe family (my uncle, my aunt and my beautiful cousin) up tobefore that day. My uncle, called Paul, offeredinvited us to stay with his family up tountil we couldhad buildbuilt our house.

CassuallyCasuallyCoincidentally my cousin hadwas the same age as me, sixteen, that's the reason for we started aour friendly relationship. We spendspent all theour time together. This "friendly" relationship was starting to makeget hot. I had never had a boyfriend and I feltfell in love with him. One day in the , he kissed me. It was wonderful. I felt that I had discovered other ways. In fact, I didhad. We made love... But one month later, something surprised me, I was pregnant.
